product_name: Jambu Bath Barefoot Shoes - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Designed to provide a barefoot feel, the Jambu Bath Barefoot shoes allow a wide range of natural motion for your feet and leg muscles on your urban excursions. With a minimalistic approach for people on the move, the Bath Barefoot shoes emulate the feel of walking in sand. Bungee cord laces allow quick and easy adjustments. Flexible rubber outsoles provide good grip on a variety of surfaces. EVA memory foam footbeds conform to the unique contours of your feet for all-day comfort. All-synthetic construction makes these vegan-friendly. Closeout.
short_description: Designed to provide a barefoot feel, the Jambu Bath Barefoot shoes allow a wide range of natural motion for your feet and leg muscles on your urban excursions.
